name: noflo-xml
description: XML components for the NoFlo flow-based programming environment
author: Henri Bergius <henri.bergius@iki.fi>

scripts.test: fbp-spec --secret test --address ws://localhost:3333 --trace --command-timeout 60 --command 'noflo-nodejs --port 3333 --capture-output --secret test --open false' spec/
